trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"></xref> within an XML Web service.
This class specifies the contents of any SOAP error message returned.
For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a URI representing the encoding style used to encode the SOAP fault message.
The value of this property should be set only if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets the value of the name attribute that relates the soap fault to the wsdl fault defined for the specified operation.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> object that contains the name attribute that relates the soap fault to the wsdl fault defined for the operation.

Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specification for encoding of content not specifically defined by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Encoding"></xref> property.
This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set.
The value should only be set if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
Otherwise the XML Web service will exhibit unexpected behavior.

Specifies whether the fault message is encoded using rules specified by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapFaultBinding.Encoding"></xref> property, or is encapsulated within a concrete XML schema.
